description: A massive expansion featuring new locations, characters, events, quests, and farm maps.
author: FlashShifter

description: A simple in-game cheats menu with options for time, weather, warps, relationships, and more.
author: CJBok

description: A large expansion adding a new village with 50+ NPCs, festivals, quests, and locations.
author: Rafseazz

description: Loads content packs that change the game's data, images, and maps without replacing game files.
author: Pathoschild

description: Place a chest next to machines and they'll automatically pull items from it and push output into it.
author: Pathoschild

description: Adds an in-game UI to edit other mods' config options. Works for any mod that uses SMAPI's config API.
author: spacechase0

description: Shows NPC locations on the map in real time, with customizable tracking and minimap support.
author: Bouhm

description: See live info about whatever's under your cursor. Works on NPCs, animals, crops, items, and more.
author: Pathoschild

description: A new area expansion east of Pelican Town with new NPCs, events, and locations.
author: lemurkat

description: Buy a tractor garage to get a tractor that can till, plant, water, fertilize, harvest, and more.
author: Pathoschild

description: An in-game item spawner menu that lets you add any item directly to your inventory.
author: CJBok

description: Access your chests from anywhere and organize them by name, category, or location.
author: Pathoschild

description: Skips the game intro, splash screens, and loading screen to save time launching the game.
author: Pathoschild

description: Lets you configure sprinkler coverage to any shape and range you like.
author: Speeder

description: Allows content packs to add new items, crops, fruit trees, and crafting recipes via JSON.
author: spacechase0

description: Overlays the world with visual data layers showing accessibility, crop details, and more.
author: Pathoschild

description: Allows you to wear more than two rings at a time with additional ring slots.
author: bcmpinc

description: A beautifully remastered version of the Immersive Farm 2 map with enhanced detail.
author: FlashShifter

description: Displays NPC gift preferences when hovering over their birthday on the calendar or social tab.
author: tstaples

description: A framework mod providing common utilities and APIs used by spacechase0's other mods.
author: spacechase0

description: Prevents failed milking/shearing attempts by showing icons when animals can be interacted with.
author: Urbanyeti

description: Allows content packs to provide alternate textures for buildings, craftables, and more.
author: PeacefulEnd

description: Makes artisan goods like wine and jelly display the source item on their icon.
author: mouse

description: Shows experience bars for each skill on the HUD so you can track progress.
author: spacechase0

description: Adds an elevator to the Skull Cavern, similar to the one in the mines.
author: lestoph

description: Adds a birthday event for your farmer. NPCs will celebrate with gifts and dialogue.
author: Omegasis

description: Adds a tier of tools beyond iridium using prismatic shards, with enhanced effects.
author: stokastic

description: Adds a fourth backpack upgrade with 48 inventory slots, purchasable from Pierre's shop.
author: spacechase0

description: NPCs change their outfits based on the current season for more variety.
author: ApryllForever

description: Automatically pets and tends to all your animals each morning so you don't have to.
author: jwdred

description: Adds a fully functional aquarium location to collect and display fish from around the valley.
author: Cherry

description: Earn friendship points by completing daily activities in town like shopping and visiting NPCs.
author: Surrenderborn

description: Pick up and move planted crops and fruit trees without destroying them.
author: mouse

description: A framework that allows modders to add companion NPCs that follow you around.
author: PeacefulEnd

description: Buy from Robin, Pierre, and other shops directly from your home computer.
author: jwdred

description: Prevents your horse from being warped to the stable, keeping it where you leave it.
author: Goldenrevolver

description: A framework providing expanded event precondition checks for other mods to use.
author: Cherry

description: Lets you destroy bushes with an axe, allowing full control over your farm layout.
author: mouse

description: Allows modders to add custom machines and processing equipment via content packs.
author: Platonymous

description: Automatically catches fish while you stand near water with a fishing rod equipped.
author: BitwiseJon

description: A framework allowing mods to send custom mail with items and recipes to the player.
author: DIGUS

description: A framework that allows content packs to add custom producer machines and rules.
author: DIGUS

description: Recover items lost when you pass out or die in the mines, purchasable from a recovery service.
author: mouse

description: Adds a train station hub map used by many expansion mods for travel between locations.
author: Cherry

description: Fixes issues with custom NPCs in festivals, schedules, and social menus.
author: spacechase0

description: Overhauls farming mechanics with soil quality, advanced crop growth, and realistic seasons.
author: Satozaki
